# Balor Nimbus (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[Abyss (Domain)|Abyss 4]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg.24

*You smash the soot against your flesh and intone the ancient, dark words. Like the legendary balor, your body bursts into lurid flames.*

The flames created by this spell do not harm you or any equipment you carry or wear. Each round, the flames deal 6d6 points of fire damage to any creature grappling you (or any creature you grapple) on your turn.

*Arcane Material Component:* A pinch of soot.
